title: Championship Skins
body: This is my first season, so I don't know exactly so I come to the boards to ask this; Are ALL championship skins available during worlds, or just the new ones? Im a thresh main and would love to get championship Thresh

replies.body: Thank you very much, by any chance do you know about when the announcement will come?

I don't know for sure whether it will just be Championship Riven and Zed up on the store during worlds or if others will be available. I recommend keeping your eyes on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for when the official announcement goes out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
